fields.name: Luke Skywalker
fields.text: When defending, you may change 1 of your {FOCUS} results to a {EVADE} result.

fields.name: Garven Dreis
fields.text: After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2 (instead of discarding it).

fields.name: Biggs Darklighter
fields.text: Other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.

fields.name: Wedge Antilles
fields.text: When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of "0").

fields.name: Horton Salm
fields.text: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may reroll any of your blank results.

fields.name: "Dutch" Vander
fields.text: After acquiring a target lock, choose another friendly ship at Range 1-2.  The chosen ship may immediately acquire a target lock.

fields.name: "Winged Gundark"
fields.text: When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your {HIT} results to a {CRIT} result.

fields.name: "Night Beast"
fields.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may perform a free focus action.

fields.name: "Backstabber"
fields.text: When attacking from outside the defender's firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: "Dark Curse"
fields.text: When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.

fields.name: "Mauler Mithel"
fields.text: When attacking at Range 1, roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: "Howlrunner"
fields.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking with its primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.

fields.name: Maarek Stele
fields.text: When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.

fields.name: Darth Vader
fields.text: During your "Perform Action" step, you may perform 2 actions.

fields.name: "Fel's Wrath"
fields.text: When the number of Damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed until the end of the Combat phase.

fields.name: Soontir Fel
fields.text: When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

fields.name: Tycho Celchu
fields.text: You may perform actions even while you have stress tokens.

fields.name: Turr Phennir
fields.text: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

fields.name: Arvel Crynyd
fields.text: You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attack.

fields.name: Chewbacca
fields.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).

fields.name: Boba Fett
fields.text: When you reveal a bank maneuver ({BANKLEFT} or {BANKRIGHT}), you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.

fields.name: Lando Calrissian
fields.text: After you execute a green maneuver, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action shown on its action bar.

fields.name: Han Solo
fields.text: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice.  If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.

fields.name: Ten Numb
fields.text: When attacking, 1 of your {CRIT} results cannot be canceled by defense dice.

fields.name: Kath Scarlet
fields.text: When attacking, the defender receives 1 stress token if he cancels at least 1 {CRIT} result.

fields.name: Krassis Trelix
fields.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

fields.name: Ibtisam
fields.text: When attacking or defending, if you have at least 1 stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.

fields.name: Roark Garnet
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3.  Until the end of the phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "12."

fields.name: Kyle Katarn
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.

fields.name: Major Rhymer
fields.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.

fields.name: Captain Jonus
fields.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.

fields.name: Jan Ors
fields.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: Captain Kagi
fields.text: When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.

fields.name: Colonel Jendon
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.

fields.name: Lieutenant Lorrir
fields.text: When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the ({BANKLEFT} 1) or ({BANKRIGHT} 1) template instead of the ({STRAIGHT} 1) template.

fields.name: Tetran Cowall
fields.text: When you reveal a {KTURN} maneuver, you may treat the speed of that maneuver as "1," "3," or "5".

fields.name: Captain Yorr
fields.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.

fields.name: Carnor Jax
fields.text: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot perform focus or evade actions and cannot spend focus or evade tokens.

fields.name: Kir Kanos
fields.text: When attacking at Range 2-3, you may spend 1 evade token to add 1 {HIT} result to your roll.

fields.name: Lieutenant Blount
fields.text: When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.

fields.name: Airen Cracken
fields.text: After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action.

fields.name: Colonel Vessery
fields.text: When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.

fields.name: Rexler Brath
fields.text: After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.

fields.name: Etahn A'baht
fields.text: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its {HIT} results to a {CRIT} result.

fields.name: Corran Horn
fields.text: At the start of the End phase, you may perform one attack.  You cannot attack during the next round.

fields.name: "Echo"
fields.text: When you decloak, you must use the ({BANKLEFT} 2) or ({BANKRIGHT} 2) template instead of the ({STRAIGHT} 2) template.

fields.name: Jek Porkins
fields.text: When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die.  On a {HIT} result, deal 1 facedown Damage card to this ship.

fields.name: "Whisper"
fields.text: After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus to your ship.

fields.name: Jake Farrell
fields.text: After you perform a focus action or are assigned a focus token, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

fields.name: Wes Janson
fields.text: After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from the defender.

fields.name: "Hobbie" Klivian
fields.text: When you acquire or spend a target lock, you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.

fields.name: Tarn Mison
fields.text: When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.

fields.name: Gemmer Sojan
fields.text: While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.

fields.name: Nera Dantels
fields.text: You can perform {TORPEDO} secondary weapon attacks against enemy ships outside your firing arc.

fields.name: Keyan Farlander
fields.text: When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your {FOCUS} results to {HIT}results.

fields.name: "Leebo"
fields.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, draw 1 additional Damage card, choose 1 to resolve, and discard the other.

fields.name: Eaden Vrill
fields.text: When performing a primary weapon attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: Dash Rendar
fields.text: You may ignore obstacles during the Activation phase and when performing actions.

fields.name: Captain Oicunn
fields.text: After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 damage.

fields.name: Prince Xizor
fields.text: When defending, a friendly ship at Range 1 may suffer 1 uncanceled {HIT} or {CRIT} result instead of you.

fields.name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
fields.text: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change 1 of your {FOCUS} results to a {CRIT} result.

fields.name: Commander Kenkirk
fields.text: If you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, increase your agility value by 1.

fields.name: Guri
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, if you are at Range 1 of an enemy ship, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

fields.name: Laetin A'shera
fields.text: After you defend against an attack, if the attack did not hit, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.

fields.name: Serissu
fields.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending, it may reroll 1 defense die.

fields.name: IG-88B
fields.text: Once per round, after you perform an attack that does not hit, you may perform an attack with an equipped {CANNON} secondary weapon.

fields.name: IG-88A
fields.text: After you perform an attack that destroys the defender, you may recover 1 shield.

fields.name: IG-88C
fields.text: After you perform a boost action, you may perform a free evade action.

fields.name: N'Dru Suhlak
fields.text: When attacking, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: IG-88D
fields.text: You may execute the ({SLOOPLEFT} 3) or ({SLOOPRIGHT} 3) maneuver using the corresponding ({TURNLEFT} 3) or ({TURNRIGHT} 3) template.

fields.name: Kaa'To Leeachos
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from another friendly ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

fields.name: Kavil
fields.text: When attacking a ship outside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: Boba Fett
fields.text: When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each enemy ship at Range 1.

fields.name: Kath Scarlet
fields.text: When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: Emon Azzameen
fields.text: When dropping a bomb, you may use the [{TURNLEFT} 3], [{STRAIGHT} 3], or [{TURNRIGHT} 3] template instead of the [{STRAIGHT} 1] template.

fields.name: Drea Renthal
fields.text: After you spend a target lock, you may receive 1 stress token to acquire a target lock.

fields.name: Dace Bonearm
fields.text: When an enemy ship at Range 1-3 receives at least 1 ion token, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

fields.name: Palob Godalhi
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from an enemy ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.

fields.name: Torkil Mux
fields.text: At the end of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. Until the end of the Combat phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "0".

fields.name: Commander Alozen
fields.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship at Range 1.

fields.name: Moralo Eval
fields.text: You can perform {CANNON} secondary weapons attacks against ships inside your auxiliary firing arc.

fields.name: Talonbane Cobra
fields.text: When attacking or defending, double the effect of your range combat bonuses.

fields.name: Latts Razzi
fields.text: When a friendly ship declares an attack, you may spend a target lock you have on the defender to reduce its agility by 1 for that attack.

fields.name: Bossk
fields.text: When you perform an attack that hits, before dealing damage, you may cancel 1 of your {CRIT} results to add 2 {HIT} results.

fields.name: Graz the Hunter
fields.text: When defending, if the attacker is inside your firing arc, roll 1 additional defense die.

fields.name: Miranda Doni
fields.text: Once per round when attacking, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die {STRONG}or{/STRONG} roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.

fields.name: "Redline"
fields.text: You may maintain 2 target locks on the same ship.  When you acquire a target lock, you may acquire a second lock on that ship.

fields.name: Esege Tuketu
fields.text: When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, it may treat your focus tokens as its own.

fields.name: "Deathrain"
fields.text: When dropping a bomb, you may use the front guides of your ship.  After dropping a bomb, you may perform a free barrel roll action.

fields.name: Juno Eclipse
fields.text: When you reveal your maneuver, you may increase or decrease its speed by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

fields.name: Lieutenant Colzet
fields.text: At the start of the End phase, you may spend a target lock you have on an enemy ship to flip 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to it faceup.

fields.name: Zertik Strom
fields.text: Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot add their range combat bonus when attacking.

fields.name: CR90 Corvette (Fore)
fields.text: When attacking with your primary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to roll 1 additional attack die.

fields.name: Raider-class Corv. (Fore)
fields.text: Once per round, after you perform a primary weapon attack, you may spend 2 energy to perform another primary weapon attack.
